title: Drawing, "Design for a Coffeepot", 1936
medium: Pen and black ink, brown ink, yellow color pencil, graphite on cream tracing paper
inscribed: Inscribed in pen and black ink at lower right: J.P./36/POT.
creditline: Gift of John Finguerra in memory of his brother Jim Finguerra
description:
Round coffeepot with flared sides and bulbous lower body drawn in elevation, the lid surmounted by a cylindrical finial indicated in brown ink bound by three applied horizontal bands indicated in yellow color pencil. Circular handle indicated in brown ink and bound at the side by three applied horizontal bands indicated in yellow color pencil. Underdrawing in graphite of coffeepot in golden section.
Puiforcat collection contains two archival photographs of coffeepot from same tea service, Box 8, Folder 1 "Coffeepots," #9163.
Puiforcat Fabrication #: 9163, Pot pied 3 jones anse ete graine ivoire avec jones
